name: Run, Glim, Run!
description:
When a cave creature named Glim wandered underground, one of the walls cracked and water gushed out behind him. Little Glim hates water and can't live without light. Collect fireflies, jump on platforms, beware of stalagmites and most importantly: DO. NOT. TOUCH. THE WATER. 

Controls:

Space to jump

Esc to pause 

Button with "?" to see tutorial

Our team:

- Anna Neshitova: team lead, gamedesign

P.S.  This is our very first game, if you have any comments or ideas, be sure to let us know! Constructive feedback is important to us <3
